img.alt: Continuity of Learning Plan Update Letter

h3.a: Continuity of Learning Plan Update Letter

div.p: Dear Munising Public School Families, I hope this communication finds you safe and healthy. When Governor Whitmer made the decision to close schools due to the COVID-19 pandemic for the...
In our first step toward getting back to teaching and learning, on Wednesday, April 15, 2020, instructional packets with educational materials will be available for Mather Elementary and...

li.a: Governor Whitmer Closes Schools for Remainder of School Year
Home Internet Access Survey for Parents

div.p: Instructional packets will be available on Tuesday, April 21 for pick up from 11:00am to 1:00pm at each school and for delivery along our bus routes. For Mather Elementary, there are only instructional packets for Kindergarten and 2nd grade students this week. Middle & High School students may or may not have an instructional packet on a weekly basis, so those students should be checking their school email for contact from their teachers.

A letter is being mailed today to all Munising Public School district families that provides details of our Continuity of Learning Plan. The letter has also been posted on the Munising Public Schools website at www.munisingschools.com and on the Munising Public Schools Facebook page. Stay safe and healthy!

Please go the Munising Public Schools website at www.munisingschools.com or the Munising Public Schools Facebook page for an update on instructional packet pick up and delivery scheduled for Wednesday, April 15, 2020. Stay safe and healthy!

Breakfast and Lunch Delivery Changes to Monday, Wednesday & Friday Only
As many of you are aware, Munising Public Schools recently explored the possibility of expanding our breakfast/lunch deliveries out to our bus routes. After considering the potential for an increase in health risk to our employees, however, we have decided to maintain deliveries to our existing pick up locations, with the exception that we will now do a delivery for pick up at Windjammer Apartments instead of Hilltop Road.
We are also now changing to Monday, Wednesday and Friday pick up only, with two breakfasts and lunches being available each day.
Please visit the Munising Public Schools Facebook page and website for more details.

Due to the winter storm forecast for Monday, April 13, there will be no breakfast or lunch available at any of the the pick up locations or at the Munising Middle & High School. Breakfast and lunch will resume on Tuesday, April 14 at the school and existing pick up locations.

Just a reminder that the Munising High School locker curbside pickup is today, Friday, April 10 from 11:00am to 1:00pm. Pull up in front of the main entrance and remain in your vehicle. The contents of the remaining Middle School lockers may also be picked up during that time.

Please go the Munising Public Schools website at www.munisingschools.com or the Munising Public Schools Facebook page for an update on the school plan for resuming teaching and learning next week. We miss our students!
Please go the Munising Public Schools website at www.munisingschools.com or the Munising Public Schools Facebook page for directions regarding Sayklly's Easter Egg pick up.
